head.title: Beckjord Finishes For a Fourth Time

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

hedline.hl1: Beckjord Finishes For a Fourth Time

abstract.p: Pekka Aalto wins Sri Chinmoy 3,100-Mile Race (S)

block.p: Suprabha Beckjord, 44, of Washington completed the Sri Chinmoy 3,100-Mile Race for the fourth time when she finished Saturday night in 54 days 15 hours 51 minutes 34 seconds. She is the first four-time finisher of the race, which was held in Queens and was founded in 1977.

Suprabha Beckjord, 44, of Washington completed the Sri Chinmoy 3,100-Mile Race for the fourth time when she finished Saturday night in 54 days 15 hours 51 minutes 34 seconds. She is the first four-time finisher of the race, which was held in Queens and was founded in 1977.

Pekka Aalto of Helsinki, Finland, was the fastest of the four runners in 47 days 13:29:55. The finishers completed 5,648.688 laps around a course of 0.5488 miles on the sidewalks of a city block. The runners began each day at 6 a.m. and usually ran until 10 p.m.
